name: Telegram Radio Player V3
description: A Telegram Bot by Safone to Play Nonstop Radio/Music/YouTube Live in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: Telegram API ID for User Accounts. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Telegram API HASH for User Accounts. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token. Get it from https://t.me/botfather

SESSION_STRING.description: User Account Session String. Get it from https://replit.com/@AsmSafone/genStr

CHAT_ID.description: ID of your Channel or Group where the bot plays Radio/Music/YouTube Lives.

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist if CHAT_ID is a Group. Leave blank if CHAT_ID is a channel.

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of Authorized Users who can use Admin commands (for multiple users, separate by space).

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Set to 'True' if you want to restrict /play commands to admins of CHAT_ID. Default is 'False'.

MAXIMUM_DURATION.description: Maximum Duration of a song to be played using the /play command (in minutes).

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio Station or YouTube Live video to stream with /radio command.

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message for users who message the USER account in PM. Leave blank if not needed.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API token. Get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Name of your Heroku app, as given in the first field on the Heroku deployment page.
